name: complete-placement-suite
description: Unified platform for job tracking, interview prep, and resume building

scripts.install:all: cd apps/job-tracker && npm install && cd ../placement-readiness && npm install && cd ../resume-builder && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "DASH,JOB,PREP,RESUME" -c "white,cyan,magenta,green" "npm run dev:dash" "npm run dev:job" "npm run dev:prep" "npm run dev:resume"
